langStringTextType.text: Contains the nameplate information attached to the product
Note: see also [IRDI] 0112/2///61987#ABN590#001 URI of product instance
Note: see also [IRDI] 0112/2///61987#ABA565#007 manufacturer Note: mandatory property according to EU Machine Directive 2006/42/EC.
Meta-Level Software AG
Meta-Level Software AG
Note: see also [IRDI] 0112/2///61987#ABA567#007 name of product Note: Short designation of the product is meant. Note: mandatory property according to EU Machine Directive 2006/42/EC.
Platform for Asset Administration Shells
Plattform für Verwaltungsschalen

The SMC “ContactInformation” contains information on how to contact the manufacturer or an authorised service provider, e.g. when a maintenance service is required. Note: physical address is a mandatory property according to EU Machine Directive 2006/42/EC

enumeration: 0173-1#07-AAS927#001 (administrativ contact), 0173-1#07-AAS928#001 (commercial contact), 0173-1#07-AAS929#001 (other contact), 0173-1#07-AAS930#001 (hazardous goods contact), 0173-1#07-AAS931#001 (technical contact). Note: the above mentioned ECLASS enumeration should be declared as “open” for further addition. ECLASS enumeration IRDI is preferable. If no IRDI available, custom input as String may also be accepted.

Note: see also [IRDI] 0112/2///61360_4#ADA005#001 country code. country codes defined accord. to DIN EN ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 codes. Mandatory property according to EU Machine Directive 2006/42/EC. Recommendation: property declaration as MLP is required by its semantic definition. As the property value is language independent, users are recommended to provide maximal 1 string in any language of the user’s choice.
DE
Note: language codes defined accord. to ISO 639-1. Note: as per ECLASS definition, Expression and representation of thoughts, information, feelings, ideas through characters.
Note: notation accord. to ISO 8601 Note: for time in UTC the zone designator “Z” is to be used
Note: see also [IRDI] 0112/2///61987#ABA129#001 city/town. Mandatory property according to EU Machine Directive 2006/42/EC.
Musterstadt
Saarbrücken
Meta-Level Software AG
Vertrieb

Recommendation: property declaration as MLP is required by its semantic definition. As the property value is language independent, users are recommended to provide maximal 1 string in any language of the user’s choice.

enumeration: 0173-1#07-AAS754#001 (office), 0173-1#07-AAS755#001 (office mobile), 0173-1#07-AAS756#001 (secretary), 0173-1#07-AAS757#001 (substitute), 0173-1#07-AAS758#001 (home), 0173-1#07-AAS759#001 (private mobile)
Montag – Freitag 08:00 bis 16:00

Recommendation: property declaration as MLP is required by its semantic definition. As the property value is language independent, users are recommended to provide maximal 1 string in any language of the user’s choice.

Note: conditionally mandatory property according to EU Machine Directive 2006/42/EC. One of the two properties must be provided: ManufacturerProductFamily (0173-1#02-AAU731#001) or ManufacturerProductType (0173-1#02-AAO057#002).
19-22 Software (server operating system)

Note: see also [IRDI] 0112/2///61987#ABA300#006 code of product Note: conditionally mandatory property according to EU Machine Directive 2006/42/EC. One of the two properties must be provided: ManufacturerProductFamily (0173-1#02-AAU731#001) or ManufacturerProductType (0173-1#02-AAO057#002).
19-22-90 Software (server operating system, other)

Note: see also [IRDI] 0112/2///61987#ABA950#006 order code of product Note: Recommendation: property declaration as MLP is required by its semantic definition. As the property value is language independent, users are recommended to provide maximal 1 string in any language of the user’s choice.
ML-AAS-Suite

Note: see also [IRDI] 0112/2///61987#ABA581#006 article number Note: Recommendation: property declaration as MLP is required by its semantic definition. As the property value is language independent, users are recommended to provide maximal 1 string in any language of the user’s choice.
ML-AAS-Suite
Note: see also [IRDI] 0112/2///61987#ABA951#007 serial number
Note: mandatory property according to EU Machine Directive 2006/42/EC.
Note: see also [IRDI] 0112/2///61987#ABB757#007 date of manufacture Note: format by lexical representation: CCYY-MM-DD

Note: see also [IRDI] 0112/2///61987#ABA926#006 hardware version Note: Recommendation: property declaration as MLP is required by its semantic definition. As the property value is language independent, users are recommended to provide maximal 1 string in any language of the user’s choice.

Note: see also [IRDI] 0112/2///61987#ABA302#004 firmware version Note: Recommendation: property declaration as MLP is required by its semantic definition. As the property value is language independent, users are recommended to provide maximal 1 string in any language of the user’s choice.

Note: see also [IRDI] 0112/2///61987#ABA601#006 software version Note: Recommendation: property declaration as MLP is required by its semantic definition. As the property value is language independent, users are recommended to provide maximal 1 string in any language of the user’s choice.
Note: see also [IRDI] 0112/2///61360_4#ADA034#001 country of origin Note: Country codes defined accord. to DIN EN ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 codes
Note: CE marking is declared as mandatory according to EU Machine Directive 2006/42/EC.
Submodel containing techical data of the asset and associated product classificatons.
Teilmodell, das die technischen Daten der Anlage und die zugehörigen Produktklassifizierungen enthält.
General information, for example ordering and manufacturer information.

Legally valid designation of the natural or judicial body which is directly responsible for the design, production, packaging and labeling of a product in respect to its being brought into the market.
Imagefile for logo of manufacturer provided in common format (.png, .jpg).
Product designation as given by the mnaufacturer. Short description of the product, product group or function (short text) in common language.
unique product identifier of the manufacturer
By manufactures issued unique combination of numbers and letters used to identify the device for ordering
Image file for associated product provided in common format (.png, .jpg).
Product classifications by association of product classes with common classification systems.
Single product classification item by association with product class in a particular classification system or property dictionary.
Common name of the classification system.
Common version identifier of the used classification system, in order to distinguish different version of the property dictionary.
Class of the associated product or industrial equipment in the classification system. According to the notation of the system.
Individual characteristics that describe the product and its technical properties.
Main subdivision possibility for properties.
Subordinate subdivision possibility for properties.
Subordinate subdivision possibility for properties.
Further information on the product, the validity of the information provided and this data record.
Statement by the manufacturer in text form, e.g. scope of validity of the statements, scopes of application, conditions of operation.
Denotes a date on which the data specified in the Submodel was valid from for the associated asset.
Contains the nameplate information attached to the product
Note: see also [IRDI] 0112/2///61987#ABN590#001 URI of product instance
Note: see also [IRDI] 0112/2///61987#ABA565#007 manufacturer Note: mandatory property according to EU Machine Directive 2006/42/EC.

Note: CE marking is declared as mandatory according to EU Machine Directive 2006/42/EC.
The Submodel HierarchicalStructures identified by its semanticId. The Submodel idShort can be picked freely.
Base entry point for the Entity tree in this Submodel, this must be a Self-managed Entity reflecting the Assets administrated in the AAS this Submodel is part of.

Base entry point for the Entity tree in this Submodel, this must be a Self-managed Entity reflecting the Assets administrated in the Asset Administration Shell this Submodel is part of. The idShort of the EntryNode can be picked freely and may reflect a name of the asset.
To be used if bulk components are referenced, e.g., a 10x M4x30 screw.
Modeling of logical connections between components and sub-components. Either this or "IsPartOf" must be used, not both.

Base entry point for the Entity tree in this Submodel, this must be a Self-managed Entity reflecting the Assets administrated in the Asset Administration Shell this Submodel is part of. The idShort of the EntryNode can be picked freely and may reflect a name of the asset.
To be used if bulk components are referenced, e.g., a 10x M4x30 screw.
ArcheType of the Submodel, there are three allowed enumeration entries: 1. “Full”, 2. “OneDown” and 3. “OneUp”.

langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.text: unique global identification of the product using an universal resource identifier (URI)

legally valid designation of the natural or judicial person which is directly responsible for the design, production, packaging and labeling of a product in respect to its being brought into circulation
Short description of the product (short text)
Top level of a 3 level manufacturer specific product hierarchy
2nd level of a 3 level manufacturer specific product hierarchy
Characteristic to differentiate between different products of a product family or special variants
By manufactures issued unique combination of numbers and letters used to identify the device for ordering
unique product identifier of the manufacturer
unique combination of numbers and letters used to identify the device once it has been manufactured
Year as completion date of object
Date from which the production and / or development process is completed or from which a service is provided completely
Version of the hardware supplied with the device
Version of the firmware supplied with the device
Version of the software used by the device
Country where the product was manufactured
A graphic mark used to represent a company, an organisation or a product
Collection of product markings
Group of properties that are listed on the asset's nameplate and are grouped based on guidelines
common name of the marking
alphanumeric character sequence identifying a certificate or approval
Date, at which the specified certificate is issued
Date, at which the specified certificate expires
conformity symbol of the marking
where applicable, additional information on the marking in plain text, e.g. the ID-number of the notified body involved in the conformity process
contains information related to explosion safety according to device nameplate
classification according to the standard or directive to which the approval applies
certificates and approvals pertaining to general usage and compliance with constructional standards and directives
classification of an explosion protection according to the specific measures applied to avoid ignition of a surrounding explosive atmosphere
from the manufacturer for the capital assets limited isolation with given(indicated) operating conditions
designation used to uniquely identify a control/reference drawing stored in a file system
Note: X if any, otherwise no entry
U if any, otherwise no entry
Contains properties which are related to the ambient conditions of the device.
Contains properties which are related to the process conditions of the device.
specifies the parameters of external electrical circuits.
category of device in accordance with directive 94/9/EC
part of a hazardous area classification system indicating the likelihood of the existence of a classified hazard
Marking used only in specific regions, e.g. North America: class/divisions, EAC: “1” or NEC: “AIS”
classification of dangerous gaseous substances based on their ability to cause an explosion
lower limit of the temperature range of the surrounding space in which the component, the pipework or the system can be operated
upper limit of the temperature range of the surrounding space in which the component, the pipework or the system can be operated
maximum permissible surface temperature of a device used in an explosion hazardous area with combustible dust
lowest temperature to which the wetted parts of the equipment can be subjected without permanent impairment of operating characteristics
highest temperature to which the wetted parts of the device may be subjected without permanent impairment of operating characteristics
classification system of electrical apparatus, based on its maximum surface temperature, related to the specific explosive atmosphere for which it is intended to be used
alphanumeric character sequence identifying an electrical terminal
Characteristic of the intrinsically safe circuit
FISCO certified intrinsically safe fieldbus circuit (IEC 60079-11)
2-WISE certified intrinsically safe circuit (IEC 60079-47)
properties characterizing the safety related parameters of a loop-powered, intrinsically safe input or output circuit
properties characterizing the safety related parameters of an intrinsically safe circuit
maximum power that can be applied to the connection facilities of the apparatus without invalidating the type of protection
maximum voltage (peak a.c. or d.c.) that can be applied to the connection facilities of the apparatus without invalidating the type of protection
maximum current (peak a.c. or d.c) that can be applied to the connection facilities of the apparatus without invalidating the type of protection
maximum equivalent internal capacitance of the apparatus which is considered as appearing across the connection facilities
maximum equivalent internal inductance of the apparatus which is considered as appearing across the connection facilities
maximum electrical power that can be taken from the apparatus
maximum voltage (peak a.c. or d.c.) that can occur at the connection facilities of the apparatus at any applied voltage up to the maximum voltage
maximum current (peak a.c. or d.c.) in the apparatus that can be taken from the connection facilities of the apparatus
maximum capacitance that can be connected to the connection facilities of the apparatus without invalidating the type of protection
maximum value of inductance that can be connected to the connection facilities of the apparatus without invalidating the type of protection

maximum value of ratio of inductance (Lo) to resistance (Ro) of any external circuit that can be connected to the connection facilities of the electrical apparatus without invalidating intrinsic safety
Asset specific nameplate information required by guideline, stipulation or legislation.
guideline, stipulation or legislation used for determining conformity
X if any, otherwise no entry
U if any, otherwise no entry
The SMC “ContactInformation” contains information on how to contact the manufacturer or an authorised service provider, e.g. when a maintenance service is required
function of a contact person in a process
code of a country
Available language
offsets from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)
town or city
name of the company
administrative section within an organisation where a business partner is located
Phone number including type
complete telephone number to be called to reach a business partner
characterization of a telephone according to its location or usage
Specification of the available time window
Fax number including type
complete telephone number to be called to reach a business partner's fax machine
characterization of the fax according its location or usage
E-mail address and encryption method
electronic mail address of a business partner
public part of an unsymmetrical key pair to sign or encrypt text or messages
characterization of an e-mail address according to its location or usage
characterization of a public key according to its encryption process
ContactInformation/IPCommunication IP-based communication channels, e.g. chat or video call
web site address where information about the product or contact is given
characterization of an IP-based communication channel
street name and house number
ZIP code of address
P.O. box number
ZIP code of P.O. box address
federal state a part of a state
surname of a contact person
first name of a contact person
middle names of contact person
common, formal, religious, or other title preceding a contact person's name
academic title preceding a contact person's name
additional information of the contact person
Collection of explosion safety specifications
